attributes.action: When those involed in Pulic Disorder are convicted they should forfit their mobile phones
attributes.additional_details: Those who have cause distress to the community by rioting and public order offenses should have their mobile phones confascated and banned from owning a mobile phone for ten years. If caught with a mobile during this time a police officer can confascate the mobile and arrest the person and they should be given a fine of £1000.
